text: Puerto Rico participated in the 2010 Summer Youth Olympics in Singapore. The Puerto Rico team consisted of 15 athletes competing in 9 sports: athletics, basketball, boxing, gymnastics, sailing, swimming, table tennis, tennis and triathlon. Puerto Rico left Singapore with its first ever medal won by flyweight (51 kg) boxer and flag bearer Emmanuel Rodríguez, after winning the final round against Nauru's DJ Maaki. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="font-size:90%" |- !
